doc_name: 12. Attestor-MSP Hazel Side Letter Agreement for Sept Funding Fully Executed.pdf
doc_description: This document is a side letter agreement between Hazel Partners Holdings LLC and MSP Recovery, LLC, detailing the terms and conditions for a September funding tranche of $1,750,000 under an existing credit agreement. It outlines the obligations of the borrower and the lender, including conditions for borrowing, legal considerations, and execution details.

structure.title: Introduction and Reference to Existing Credit Agreement
structure.summary: This section introduces the parties involved in the agreement and references the existing credit agreement and its amendments. It sets the context for the September funding tranche.
structure.text: Reference is hereby made to that certain Second Amended and Restated Credit Agreement, dated as of November 10, 2023...

structure.title: Terms of September Funding
structure.summary: The lender agrees to provide a funding tranche of $1,750,000, subject to conditions in the credit agreement. The section also discusses the implications of the Third Amendment and the remaining available tranches.
structure.text: On the terms set forth herein, the Lender has agreed to make available to the Borrower funding of a tranche in the amount of $1,750,000...

structure.title: Reservation of Rights and Legal Provisions
structure.summary: This section clarifies that the letter does not limit the lender's rights and reserves the right to pursue remedies. It also states the governing law and execution details.
structure.text: Nothing contained in this letter is intended to constitute an election of any remedy to which Administrative Agent or Lender may be entitled...

structure.title: Signatures
structure.summary: The section contains the signatures of the authorized representatives of the involved parties, confirming their agreement to the terms outlined.
structure.text: ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT AND LENDER: HAZEL PARTNERS HOLDINGS LLC By: Name: Title: [signatures continue on following page]...

structure.title: Audit Trail
structure.summary: This section provides a detailed audit trail of the document's signing process, including timestamps and IP addresses.
structure.text: Audit trail Title File name Document ID Audit trail date format Status Powered by Sign...

_source_file: 12. Attestor-MSP Hazel Side Letter Agreement for Sept Funding Fully Executed.pdf
